title: Dashboard Data
description: The Dashboard Data object is a JSON-LD representation of the data used in the dashboard. It contains information about the dashboard, including its ID, type, and various properties related to the dashboard's content.

@id.description: The unique identifier of the Dashboard Data object

@type.description: The type of the object, in this case DashboardData

schema:dateCreated.description: The date on which the Taxonomic Expert was created or the item was added to a DataFeed, following the ISO Date Time Format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX

schema:dateModified.description: The date on which the Expert was most recently modified or when the item's entry was modified within a DataFeed, following the ISO Date Time Format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX

schema:datePublished.description: Date of the expert was published, following the ISO Date Time Format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSXXX

schema:identifier.description: A unique identifier to identify the author; ORCID identifiers are valid

schema:birthDate.description: The birth date of the Taxonomic Expert
